title: Broad bean and artichoke hotpot with poached eggs
ingredients: ['2 tablespoons olive oil', '2 small onions, cut into wedges', '2 cloves garlic, thinly sliced', '2 teaspoons cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon paprika', '1 teaspoon saffron threads', 'some mint, bay leaves and parsley, tied in a bundle', '1 litre vegetable stock', '12 baby artichokes, trimmed and cut in half, placed in acid water', '400g podded broad beans', '1 tablespoon white vinegar', '4 eggs', 'For serving', 'shaved parmesan', 'chopped fresh mint and parsley']
